SEARCH
Package com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers

Class PrimaryController

java.lang.Object
com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.PrimaryController
public class PrimaryController extends Object
Controller class for the primary screen. It displays a list of films and allows the user to filter and sort the films. The controller also allows the user to view film details and navigate to the edit profile screen or logout.
Author:
Agata (Agy) Olaussen (@agyCoding)
